item.title: Hello world, how to create a new static web site blog using Hugo
item.description: Instead to make another Hello world page or enumerating the reasons of writting a new blog, this is a writeup of how this site was build. Is a good way to make the first page useful and serve as work a memory. Maybe i can help me or someone in the future. Choosing CMS Learn something new Durable and easy to maintain Portable Simple Secure ? Technology involved This site is based of using static plain text files written in Markdown.
